thread.title: Recycle Lady: Earth Day Events

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Recycle Lady: Earth Day Events
text:
By WV Daily News ,
11 hours ago Dear Readers,
Earth Day began over 50 years ago to recognize the environment and take action to support and protect it and our planet Earth. Join the billions worldwide who will be celebrating Earth Day this year and participate in one or more of the three local Earth Day celebrations below.
Saturday, April 20
Annual Earth Day Fashion Forward
Lewis Theater at 3 p.m.
865 Court Street North, Lewisburg, WV.
Garden Party Fashion Show – Awards for best in each category.
Outfits upcycled from vintage clothing – repaired, reused, or repurposed.
Music by Mike Pushkin.
Presenter Reid Miller – Designer & consultant to WVU School of Design & Community Development .
Saturday, April 20
Monroe County Earth Day
Old World Libations from 1–6 p.m.
3493 Greenville Road, Union, WV
Presenters: Pam Thomas, Rodney Davis, Scott Ernst, Virginia Hamilton & Tammy Hale.
Stations: Monroe Gardeners, Hanging Rock Raptor Observatory, Monroe County Animal League, Archery Team, Snacks for Kids, Fish and Wildlife, Potter’s Wheel, Wreath Making, Seed Swap, Planning Your Garden or Flower Beds, Recycle, Reduce and Reuse, Farmer’s Wife & Food by OWL.
Monday, April 22, 2024
Greenbrier County Recycling Center
450 Monroe Ave., Ronceverte, WV.
Tour the facilities between 9 a.m. and 3 p.m.
Free Hot Dogs, Chips and Drinks from 11 a.m.–2 p.m.
Have questions about recycling, or interesting information about recycling? Send questions or requests to recyclelady7@gmail.com . Dear Recycle Lady is sponsored jointly by the Greenbrier Recycling Center and Greenworks Recycling.
